criterion: Provides a clear explanation of the possible causes of numbness on the left side of the face, including but not limited to Bell's palsy, facial nerve compression, and trigeminal neuralgia.
Does not suggest seeking medical attention immediately due to the temporary nature of the numbness.
Does not provide any false or misleading information about the possible causes of numbness on the left side of the face.
Asks the user if they have experienced any other symptoms or if the numbness has recurred.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation, taking into account the user's query and any relevant regional or cultural context.
Does not suggest any self-diagnosis or self-treatment methods for the numbness on the left side of the face.
Does not provide any information that could be considered harmful or misleading, such as false claims about the causes or treatment of numbness on the left side of the face.
Asks the user to provide more information about their medical history and any previous health issues.
Does not use overly complicated medical terminology or jargon that could confuse the user.
